landing.bio: With a bachelor’s degree in Electronics Engineering, I began coding more than ten years ago, first involving micro-controllers and electronics software, then as a hobby. Finally, in 2017, I decided to make programming my primary profession. Since then I have been focused on improving  my skills  and finding  interesting projects  and people  to work with.

projects.projectDetail: Test and improve your skills as a digital trader without losing your hard-earned savings!
projects.technologies: Ruby on Rails - Hosted in Heroku

projects.projectDetail: Boilerplate for an E-Commerce website with shopping cart.
Search for the prices of the main crypto coins in the market.
Manage your purchases, sales, track your inventory and print reports.

experience.aboutWork: I currently work remotely as a Contractor in an Agile developers team. The department is in charge of maintaining / developing new features on a School Bookings System in the UK.
experience.task1: Mainly using Ruby stack (RoR, Postgres, Sidekiq, Redis, Rspec) for the Backend and jQuery / JS for the Frontend.
experience.task2: Maintain actual codebase, fix issues and implement new features requested by clients.
experience.task3: Daily SCRUM meetings and following / closing issues through JIRA’s ticketing system.

experience.aboutWork: Backend (Ruby stack) and Frontend (JS) development. The company provides last-mile technological solutions for e-commerce stores
experience.task1: Migration of the main apps from Heroku to AWS, obtaining benefits up to 100% in response time and improving scalability.
experience.task2: Integration with external API’s mainly related to e-commerce, such as Tiendanube, Shopify, WooComerce.
experience.task3: Solving internal / external issues through JIRA’s ticketing system.

experience.task1: Prepare documentation and exercises about several introductory IT related courses, such as: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Python, Arduino, Git.
experience.task2: Teach online classes through an E-learning platform.
experience.task3: Follow students's progress and review excercises.

education.extra: Intensive 10-week Bootcamp covering: Javascript, Bootstrap, API’s (Google Maps, Google Voice, Facebook, Tumblr), Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Rspec, Sidekiq, Redis, Github, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Heroku.
Courses for Back-end (PHP, MySQL) and Front-end (HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, Bootstrap).

education.institute: National University of Mar del Plata
education.extra: Thesis: “Android App to Control A Domotic Home System”. Technologies: JAVA(Android), Objective C(Arduino), Google Voice's API, Bluetooth.

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from building websites and learning about technology I enjoy being outside, travelling, hiking, long walks on the beach and discovering new places.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors I very much enjoy music, particularly playing the guitar and piano. I also like a good movie or TV show.
